title: Safety by Design
description: Autonomous situational flight model allows students to examine complex behaviors in the "pilot-vehicle-operational conditions" system.  Flight certification and airworthiness requirements are mapped into formal scenarios.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: AE 6320 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 6331 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or AE 6341 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
